p: Psidium cattleyanum essential oils showed significant antibacterial activity against Porphyromonas gingivalis (MIC 20.0 µg/mL), Prevotella nigrescens (MIC 62.5 µg/mL), Fusobacterium nucleatum (MIC 12.5 µg/mL), Bacteroides fragilis (MIC 12.5 µg/mL), Actinomyces naeslundii (MIC 50 µg/mL), Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans (MIC 6.2 µg/mL), Peptostreptococcus anaerobius (MIC 62.5 µg/mL [ 44], and Neisseria gonorrhoeae (MIC 13.0 µg/mL) [ 40].
